text: <@U040MK408> hey, does setting the locale on power calendar set the time zone on the dayMoments? (<https://github.com/cibernox/ember-power-calendar/blob/49eff727309fbe77ca117062382698feb5c41fe6/addon/components/power-calendar/days.js#L181>)
I would expect everything to be localised
it isn't?

for context, we’re trying to compare a date in +01:00. And when this line 

```
dayMoment.isSame(calendar.selected, ‘day’)
```

runs, it converts the calendar selected day to utc which then makes it the previous day. I’ll mess around with locale a little more
I admit I get pretty lost in locales and timezones
I'm buried under work today tho
and all week for that matter
no worries, ill see what we can pull together and open a pr / figure it out
thanks!
<@U043951H9> might not be useful, but have you considered keeping timezones out of EPC (keep manipulations in UTC) and `utcOffset`'ing it back to the user.
yep, thats what we’re giving a go now
this area of the app is so time heavy and shows dates in three times zones
:confused:
:cry:

<@U043951H9> just a thought, as I've gone down a similar path of trying to get date manipulations in 3rd party libs — as good as this one is! — to behave correctly but it gets hard to track down timezone offsets if you're setting it once and hoping that every moment object created from that point sticks to it.
_especially in three time zones!_
:cold_sweat:
Timezones, not even once.
yeah, its always a pain
that seems to have done the trick
at least moment makes it easier
:pray: Moment :pray:
<@U043951H9> seems that you have the expertise I lack for dealing with time zones
so if you find a better approach, just let me know
cool, we did it without changing the power calendar, only because as <@U03V2PZUB> was saying, we didn’t think it should be a concern. We just normalised the input to be a utc time
if you think there is a better wait of doing it now is the time
I don't have an use case where I exercise timezones
so I'm not aware of the caveats
ok, ill have a think as we build this feature out a little
I’m live streaming tonight! <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i5smyibHf5o>
